<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We couldn&#39;t find a buffer that started at the correct offset (the most</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// common scenario).  Try to see if there is a buffer that starts at some</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// other offset but overlaps the desired range.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We already checked this one on the fast path above.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CacheItem.first == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the initial extent of the cached item is beyond the ending extent</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We really only have to check the last item in the list, since we append</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only use this if the entire request extent is contained in the cached</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise allocate a large enough buffer in the pool, memcpy the data</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t OffsetInFirstBlock = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> % BlockSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t BytesFromFirstBlock = BlockSize - OffsetInFirstBlock;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t BlockSpan = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a> - <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a> + 1;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MappedBlockStream::tryReadContiguously(uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Buffer = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt;</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Attempt to fulfill the request with a reference directly into the stream.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This can work even if the request crosses a block boundary, provided that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// all subsequent blocks are contiguous.  For example, a 10k read with a 4k</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block size can be filled with a reference if, from the starting offset,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 3 blocks in a row are contiguous.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t BlockNum = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> / <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/tarwriter-cpp/#aac035f4156e2604bfa42ba22c17b83ee">BlockSize</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t OffsetInBlock = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> % <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/tarwriter-cpp/#aac035f4156e2604bfa42ba22c17b83ee">BlockSize</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t BytesFromFirstBlock = std::min(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/tarwriter-cpp/#aac035f4156e2604bfa42ba22c17b83ee">BlockSize</a> - OffsetInBlock);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t NumAdditionalBlocks =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> - BytesFromFirstBlock, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/tarwriter-cpp/#aac035f4156e2604bfa42ba22c17b83ee">BlockSize</a>) / <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/tarwriter-cpp/#aac035f4156e2604bfa42ba22c17b83ee">BlockSize</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t RequiredContiguousBlocks = NumAdditionalBlocks + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t E = StreamLayout.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/msfstreamlayout/#a8ff01bfb0db5e159e59ecb411d020342">Blocks</a>&#91;BlockNum&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; RequiredContiguousBlocks; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, ++E) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (StreamLayout.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/msfstreamlayout/#a8ff01bfb0db5e159e59ecb411d020342">Blocks</a>&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> + BlockNum&#93; != E)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Read out the entire block where the requested offset starts.  Then drop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bytes from the beginning so that the actual starting byte lines up with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the requested starting byte.  Then, since we know this is a contiguous</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cross-block span, explicitly resize the ArrayRef to cover the entire</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// request length.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/blockdata">BlockData</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t FirstBlockAddr = StreamLayout.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/msfstreamlayout/#a8ff01bfb0db5e159e59ecb411d020342">Blocks</a>&#91;BlockNum&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t MsfOffset = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/msf/#a249763e47d375bbd4d125417d8d62728">blockToOffset</a>(FirstBlockAddr, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/tarwriter-cpp/#aac035f4156e2604bfa42ba22c17b83ee">BlockSize</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aee0e70be66536b9ef7b65ae2e5a45959">consumeError</a>(std::move(EC));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BlockData = BlockData.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a55089293ebaccd683a82d97170041376">drop&#95;front</a>(OffsetInBlock);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Buffer = ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt;(BlockData.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#adb9cab4abca6bf2855c882dcf79fb1cb">data</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343a902b0d55fddef6f8d651fe1035b7d4bd">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/mappedblockstream/#a1a421432438b984e24590ea8169dc589">MappedBlockStream::readBytes</a>(uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure we aren&#39;t trying to read beyond the end of the stream.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EC = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystream/#af20acc8b7134ce7ffa54c05a7f295fb6">checkOffsetForRead</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, Buffer.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t BytesLeft = Buffer.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t BytesWritten = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t &#42;WriteBuffer = Buffer.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref/#a0bf5f8e45bfccb0805b5e12d44622271">data</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BytesLeft &gt; 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t StreamBlockAddr = StreamLayout.Blocks&#91;BlockNum&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt; BlockData;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/msf/#a249763e47d375bbd4d125417d8d62728">blockToOffset</a>(StreamBlockAddr, BlockSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EC = MsfData.readBytes(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, BlockSize, BlockData))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint8&#95;t &#42;ChunkStart = BlockData.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#adb9cab4abca6bf2855c882dcf79fb1cb">data</a>() + OffsetInBlock;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t BytesInChunk = std::min(BytesLeft, BlockSize - OffsetInBlock);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ::memcpy(WriteBuffer + BytesWritten, ChunkStart, BytesInChunk);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BytesWritten += BytesInChunk;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BytesLeft -= BytesInChunk;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ++BlockNum;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OffsetInBlock = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a4dfd0813c3d0e0a30439b5a3e9196b59">Error::success</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/mappedblockstream/#a68772231524fb689e30d2ad36290d16d"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/mappedblockstream/#a68772231524fb689e30d2ad36290d16d">MappedBlockStream::invalidateCache</a>() &#123; CacheMap.shrink&#95;and&#95;clear(); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MappedBlockStream::fixCacheAfterWrite(uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this write overlapped a read which previously came from the pool,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// someone may still be holding a pointer to that alloc which is now invalid.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the overlapping range and update the cache entry, so any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// outstanding buffers are automatically updated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;MapEntry : CacheMap) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the end of the written extent precedes the beginning of the cached</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// extent, ignore this map entry.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>.size() &lt; MapEntry.first)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a264176188c0aadccd3ca5b6929b5a2e1aea571dc00aef155a16d4e7e1861e1682">Alloc</a> : MapEntry.second) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the end of the cached extent precedes the beginning of the written</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// extent, ignore this alloc.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MapEntry.first + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a264176188c0aadccd3ca5b6929b5a2e1aea571dc00aef155a16d4e7e1861e1682">Alloc</a>.size() &lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we get here, they are guaranteed to overlap.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="#a4ab9bd667f674c16b2cee01ab8823644">Interval</a> WriteInterval = std::make&#95;pair(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>.size());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="#a4ab9bd667f674c16b2cee01ab8823644">Interval</a> CachedInterval =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlight">          std::make&#95;pair(MapEntry.first, MapEntry.first + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a264176188c0aadccd3ca5b6929b5a2e1aea571dc00aef155a16d4e7e1861e1682">Alloc</a>.size());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If they overlap, we need to write the new data into the overlapping</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Intersection = <a href="#a7261340c665e487c72121c8611858e16">intersect</a>(WriteInterval, CachedInterval);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Intersection.first &lt;= Intersection.second);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878af6d9f1c7b49b7601fae6a545002a6763">Length</a> = Intersection.second - Intersection.first;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint64&#95;t SrcOffset =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab356ea3c8e676945f863322b38df3e14">AbsoluteDifference</a>(WriteInterval.first, Intersection.first);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint64&#95;t DestOffset =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab356ea3c8e676945f863322b38df3e14">AbsoluteDifference</a>(CachedInterval.first, Intersection.first);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ::memcpy(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a264176188c0aadccd3ca5b6929b5a2e1aea571dc00aef155a16d4e7e1861e1682">Alloc</a>.data() + DestOffset, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>.data() + SrcOffset, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878af6d9f1c7b49b7601fae6a545002a6763">Length</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e612822d4ba7bb36c9c79582a567108">BumpPtrAllocator</a> &amp;Allocator,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AltFpm) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We only want to give the user a stream containing the bytes of the FPM that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are actually valid, but we want to initialize all of the bytes, even those</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that come from reserved FPM blocks where the entire block is unused.  To do</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this, we first create the full layout, which gives us a stream with all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bytes and all blocks, and initialize everything to 255 (all blocks in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// file are unused).  Then we create the minimal layout (which contains only a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// subset of the bytes previously initialized), and return that to the user.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/msfstreamlayout">MSFStreamLayout</a> MinLayout(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/msf/#a71744b158ac455bfc08863560e6f99a0">getFpmStreamLayout</a>(Layout, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, AltFpm));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/msfstreamlayout">MSFStreamLayout</a> FullLayout(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/msf/#a71744b158ac455bfc08863560e6f99a0">getFpmStreamLayout</a>(Layout, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, AltFpm));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Result =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/writablemappedblockstream/#a1d0cc695b52f5a60416c542723f40b2f">createStream</a>(Layout.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/msf/msflayout/#ae81e213efb629de31c7e833c0f1c7e0d">SB</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/msf/superblock/#a4792a3763eaca59db556d1c9305741cd">BlockSize</a>, FullLayout, MsfData, Allocator);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Result)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Result;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt; InitData(Layout.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/msf/msflayout/#ae81e213efb629de31c7e833c0f1c7e0d">SB</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/msf/superblock/#a4792a3763eaca59db556d1c9305741cd">BlockSize</a>, 0xFF);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamwriter">BinaryStreamWriter</a> Initializer(&#42;Result);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Initializer.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamwriter/#a396d68393ffbcede5c0d7fd59c16f1c9">bytesRemaining</a>() &gt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa1e1474f15df639f0d874b21f15666f7">cantFail</a>(Initializer.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamwriter/#abb614d7e749a1af26c1d719b28ba4fb7">writeBytes</a>(InitData));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/writablemappedblockstream/#a1d0cc695b52f5a60416c542723f40b2f">createStream</a>(Layout.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/msf/msflayout/#ae81e213efb629de31c7e833c0f1c7e0d">SB</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/msf/superblock/#a4792a3763eaca59db556d1c9305741cd">BlockSize</a>, MinLayout, MsfData, Allocator);</span></CodeLine>
